name: Decheng Capital
overview: Decheng Capital is a leading venture capital firm that provides capital to early and growth stage life science companies in China. They are a team of investment professionals with complementary expertise, a long history of working together and a shared dedication to building highly successful companies that span the full spectrum of the life sciences industry. Their domain knowledge, access to innovative technologies and ability to bring proven Western products to China make them the preferred partner for entrepreneurs, domestic and multinational companies, government agencies and investors. Decheng Capital is poised to capitalize on a historic opportunity in Chinaâ€™s rapidly developing life sciences industry and to deliver superior returns for their investors.

funding_round.source_description: GeneWeave Biosciences Attracts $12 Million in Venture Capital in Round Financed by Decheng Capital, Claremont Creek Ventures and X/Seed Capital Capital Will Be Used to Complete the Development and Commercialization of the Company's First Molecular Diagnos
